00110 #if defined(_RMU_CTRL_RESETSTATE_MASK)
00111 /***************************************************************************/
00118 __STATIC_INLINE void RMU_UserResetStateSet(uint32_t userState)
00119 {
00120   EFM_ASSERT(!(userState
00121                & ~(_RMU_CTRL_RESETSTATE_MASK >> _RMU_CTRL_RESETSTATE_SHIFT)));
00122   RMU->CTRL = (RMU->CTRL & ~_RMU_CTRL_RESETSTATE_MASK)
00123               | (userState << _RMU_CTRL_RESETSTATE_SHIFT);
00124 }
00125 
00126 /***************************************************************************/
00134 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t RMU_UserResetStateGet(void)
00135 {
00136   uint32_t userState = (RMU->CTRL & _RMU_CTRL_RESETSTATE_MASK)
00137                        >> _RMU_CTRL_RESETSTATE_SHIFT;
00138   return userState;
00139 }
